By: paizhangpi, Victor Jiao, 2019, 2020
paizhang.info/MacIndex

Startup sounds, death sounds, and photos have many variations, thus they could be inaccurate. 
Sounds and photos by Apple.
Tap on the image to play startup sound.\nTap again to play death sound (if exists).\nYou can access more specifications in detail at EveryMac.
68000-based Macintosh variations including Classic Mac, Mac II, Mac LC, Quadra and Centris.
All-in-one New world PowerPC-based Macintosh Models dedicated for education purpose.
All-in-one New world PowerPC-based Macintosh Models dedicated for family and multimedia use.
New world low-end PowerPC-based Macintosh Models in a small case.
Famous and long lasting 68000-or-PowerPC-based Macintosh Models sold as bundle.
Pre-G3 PowerPC-based high performance Macintosh Models.
G3/G4/G5 PowerPC-based high performance Macintosh Models.
Mobile New world low-end PowerPC-based Macintosh Laptops
Mobile G3/G4 PowerPC-based Macintosh Laptops, mostly high-end.
More than one configurations are found for this model. Please make a selection then confirm.
